comment.text: This translation key is used to display an error message when a field is empty. It appears on the "Attribute Mapping" page as part of a form, specifically under fields marked as required (e.g., FirstName).

usage.context:
<div className="ldap_attribute-mapping">
 <FieldContainer
 style={FIELD_STYLE}
 isVertical
 labelVisible
 errorMessage={t("Common:EmptyFieldError")}
 hasError={errors.firstName}
 labelText={t("Common:FirstName")}
 isRequired
 >
 <LdapFieldComponent

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "Boş sahə" is a literal translation of "Empty field," it might sound a bit formal or technical in a user interface context. A more natural and user-friendly translation could be considered.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like "Boş qutu" (empty box) or "Boş yer" (empty space) depending on the specific field type.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "항목이 비어있습니다" is a bit too formal and literal for a simple 'Empty field' message. While grammatically correct, it might sound awkward depending on the context of the UI.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more conversational alternative like "필수 항목을 입력해주세요" (Please enter the required field) or just "필수 입력" (Required input), depending on the overall tone of the application.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "ຊ່ອງວ່າງ" literally translates to "empty space" or "gap," it doesn't quite capture the meaning of "Empty field" in the context of form validation. It lacks the connotation of a required input being left blank.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider "ບໍ່ເຕີມຂໍ້ມູນ" (bok teum khom-mun), which means "no data entered" or "field not filled," or "ປ່ອຍຫວ່າງ" (ploi wang) which translates to 'left blank'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While "හිස් ක්‍ෂේත්‍රයකි" (his kshethrâyaki) is a literal translation, it's not the most natural or concise way to express "Empty field" in Sinhala. It sounds overly formal and technical.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural and common translation would be "දහඩුවම හිස්" (dahaduwa his) or simply "හිස් දහඩුව" (his dahaduwa).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Prázdne ' is incomplete. It's missing the noun it describes. 'Prázdne' means 'empty' but needs to be followed by what is empty (e.g., 'Prázdne pole' - Empty field).
